body: So, about a week and a half ago, I saw this thread and I saw that the staff team were working on contacting youtubers and more. I don't know where I got this from, but I saw a comment that said "We are starting to advertise in the next week". It has been nearly 2 weeks now and I would like to know when these things are going to happen or are they happening right now behind the scenes. Also I made a new thread on this because I couldn't reply to it since it was in the "Ask the Seniors" section, anyways, thankyou for reading. :D

title: Advertising

replies.body:
I think it's weird how they're focusing on advertising after Atlas has been released.

If they were this serious with advertising before Atlas came out, they could have used the update as a point of interest to garner new players.

But they've missed that opportunity and the player count hasn't increased at all since the update.

Which is what was supposed to happen, apparently.
